title: Nearby Share will soon let you quickly share files between your devices without requiring approval
content:
Nearby Share is Google’s answer to Apple’s AirDrop. It’s a convenient way for Android and Chrome OS users to share files with other devices. description: Nearby Share will let you quickly share files across your devices signed into the same Google accounts without having to approve the share.
